verses.verse: Then you will say <WH559> on that day, <WH3117> "I will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thee, O Lord; <WH3068> For although Thou wast <WH599> angry <WH599> with me, Thine anger <WH639> is turned <WH7725> away, <WH7725> And Thou dost comfort <WH5162> me.

"Behold, <WH2009> God <WH410> is my salvation, <WH3444> I will trust <WH982> and not be afraid; <WH6342> For the Lord <WH3050> God <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and song, <WH2176> And He has become <WH1961> my salvation. <WH3444>"
Therefore you will joyously <WH8342> draw <WH7579> water <WH4325> From the springs <WH4599> of salvation. <WH3444>

And in that day <WH3117> you will say, <WH559> "Give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord, <WH3068> call <WH7121> on His name. <WH8034> Make <WH3045> known <WH3045> His deeds <WH5949> among the peoples; <WH5971> Make [them] remember <WH2142> that His name <WH8034> is exalted. <WH7682>"
Praise <WH2167> the Lord <WH3068> in song, <WH2167> for He has done <WH6213> excellent <WH1348> things; <WH1348> Let this <WH384> be known <WH3045> throughout <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>

Cry <WH6670> aloud <WH6670> and shout <WH7442> for joy, <WH7442> O inhabitant <WH3427> of Zion, <WH6726> For great <WH1419> in your midst <WH7130> is the Holy <WH6918> One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>
